[Home](./index.md) &gt; [rss-tracker](./rss-tracker.md) &gt; [FeedManager](./rss-tracker.feedmanager.md)

## FeedManager class

Manage RSS feeds in Obsidian.

Currently available functionality:

- Building a Markdown representation of RSS feeds including feed dashboards. [FeedManager.createFeedFromFile()](./rss-tracker.feedmanager.createfeedfromfile.md) and [FeedManager.createFeedFromUrl()](./rss-tracker.feedmanager.createfeedfromurl.md)

- Updating feeds (individual or all).  and 

- Setting all items on a feed as \_read\_. See [FeedManager.completeReadingTasks()](./rss-tracker.feedmanager.completereadingtasks.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FeedManager 
```

[createFeedFromFile(xml)](./rss-tracker.feedmanager.createfeedfromfile.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Create an RSS feed Markdown representaiton from a local XML file.

The Markdown representation consists of - a feed dashboard - a directory whic has the same name as the dashboard (without the .md extension) containing the RSS items of the feed,

The file system layout of an Obsidian RSS feed looks like this: \~\~\~ ğŸ“‚ â”œâ”€ <feedname>.md â† dashboard â•°â”€ ğŸ“‚<feedname> â”œâ”€ <item-1>.md â”œâ”€ â€¦ â•°â”€ <item-n>.md \~\~\~

The Markdown representation consists of - a feed dashboard - a directory whic has the same name as the dashboard (without the .md extension) containingthe RSS items of the feed,
